author: ColdFusion
description:
Go to https://ground.news/coldfusion to stay fully informed on every side of every story. 

Thorium has been the holy grail of energy production for the better part of a century so when China announced they got one working it took the world by surprise. The twist? It was built on declassified American research. In this episode we take a look.

Watch or listen to ColdFusion on Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/1YEwCKoRz8fEDqheXB6UJ1

title: How China Won the Thorium Nuclear Energy Race
